algorithm_technique: Brute force with bitmasking and line equation representation
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum lines to cover all given points on a 2D plane.
problem_summary_technical: Uses bitmasking to iterate through subsets of lines, representing lines by their normalized coefficients (a, b, c) and storing points on them in a hash table.
key_insights: Represent lines using normalized coefficients (a, b, c) to handle collinearity.
Bitmasking explores all combinations of potential lines to cover points.
The problem can be framed as a set cover variation.
